name: Science Girls
description: Schoolgirls fight aliens with the power of science! Gather a team of science-themed specialists and defend your homeworld in classic turn-based combat.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 2000 or higher Memory: 256 MB RAM

reviews.review_text: super cute, relaxed, science-y, turn-based combat game with six unique heroines who fight aliens to save the day. perfect & totally worth it.
Cute game, pretty fun. Good for a distraction on a slow Sunday. Lots of little scientific and skeptical tidbits here and there.

Science Girls is an RPG base on six girls come together to stop an alien invasion. The game itself could need some design polish, couple of mistakes, simple plot and shallow characters. However Science Girls is not a bad game and do recommend to try and play if you love RPG game.

I bought this game as a joke, but the joke was on me. The game has very simple turned based combat, with some depth but it is clearly for a younger audience. As I was playing it, the characters kept 'teaching' me things and at first I thought it was bad writing, but then I realized this game was trying to educate kids and that just made it so cute like in a very sincere way. I think a kid around 9-12 that likes RPGs would probably get their money's worth out of this game or anyone else that appreciates sincere but ultimately low quality indie titles.

cute anime style game reminds of a run down version of the persona games i do recomend it for those who are new to rpg's, anime fans and sciance geeks like me lol   i personally liked it for the reason is its cute its funney in parts and its the kind of game that has a sense of unique-ness to it for these reasons and many others im gonna give sciance girls personal rating of 8/10

I gotta be honest. I love crazy, weird games. For the price, this is a must have for the sound effects alone. Absolutely hilarious. If you liked games such as Recettear and Long Live the Queen then this is for you.
